member.name: M:Facebook.Client.FacebookSessionClient.Logout
member.summary: Log a user out of Facebook.

member.name: T:Facebook.Client.FacebookDialogPage
member.summary: An empty page that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.

member.name: M:Facebook.Client.FacebookDialogPage.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property is typically used to configure the page.
